thread.title: Allied Mortgage Group Inc. Offers Complimentary Home Buyer Warranties
thread.title_full: Allied Mortgage Group Inc. Offers Complimentary Home Buyer Warranties

author: Bob Wexler
title: Allied Mortgage Group Inc. Offers Complimentary Home Buyer Warranties
text:
Allied Mortgage Group, a leading mortgage banker based in Bala Cynwyd, PA, continues to focus its efforts on achieving the highest customer satisfaction rates by offering consumers tangible benefits. Deciding what mortgage company to choose has just gotten easier for consumers. The Company has introduced a new initiative called The Buyers Bonus Program. This unique program offers a complimentary one-year home warranty plan for customers who purchase a home with a loan provided by Allied Mortgage Group. Allied is now offering a complimentary First American Home Buyers Protection Plan which provides coverage on most essential systems and appliances in a home that fail due to normal wear and tear. This warranty is subject to geographic restrictions and is for single family homes up to 5000 square feet. The home warranty offers budget protection for costly breakdowns that often occur after the purchase of a home.
Bob Wexler, Vice President of Strategic Initiatives says, "We know our products, service and people are excellent. This Buyer Bonus Program is another tangible expression of our commitment to the public and the promotion of home ownership."
Allied's Buyer Bonus Program also works with new home construction, providing buyers with a year of protection that begins when the builder's warranty ends. "Allied is helping consumers protect their investment and their future with this unique free program." said Mr. Wexler.
About Allied Mortgage: Allied Mortgage Group (NMLS #1067) is a 22- year-old mortgage lender that has been creating extraordinary experiences since 1993. We are headquartered in Bala Cynwyd, PA and currently licensed in 28 states. For a full list of licenses please visit http://www.nmlsconsumeraccess.org/ . To experience the “Allied Difference” visit our website at https://alliedmg.com/ .
